name: [GAMEJAM] Touhou Risk of Fire / 東方焼亡隊
name_original: [GAMEJAM] Touhou Risk of Fire / 東方焼亡隊
description:
Scenario : 

[A fire incident is spreading around Gensokyo Spirits from hell flows out to make everyone mad The burning heat taking over people's sanity They all explode and want to fight The shrine maiden is being lazy again The heat is too much for her , so she calls others for the job A shy yet creative kappa and a very excited frog god May they spread rain and extinguished the flames that devours Gensokyo]

Play as Nitori Kawashiro or Suwako Moriya in a roguelite game against fire 
Controls :
WASD movement
Space : dash
Right Clic : shot
Left Clic : special
E [accept / buy / pick up items]

note : touch the lantern to change floor in the dungeons
note : this is a game jam project
